originalTranscription: Witch coming into a medieval town. Everyone flees for cover. Just being in her eye line is dangerous so everyone hides. I get a feeling she's coming from underground ans she's close by. I hear her cackling. I climb a wooden wall and hang on by the top hising on yhe opposite side to the door I think she'd come out of. I hear her close but never see her. I wake up. I fall asleep. I'm blind in my dream. Witch's curse? My sight is regained. I step out into a courtyard with the King, his bodyguard, and a goofy friend of mine. He thrusts a sword at me which I catch between my palms. He pulls back. I turn to the bodyguard, incredulous, to gauge his reaction but he's stoic. I turn back to the King and he thrusts again the same way! I catch the blade once more, exclaiming as I do. This continues, and it dawns on me that I'm stuck in a time loop. A few more desperate explanations in vain and defense manovers and the loop stops. Because my good friend stabs the King in his chest with a pin with a circle attached. His bodyguard lungs at my friend. I come between them urging that he stand trial instead.
summary: A witch terrorizes a medieval town, causing blindness. After regaining sight, the dreamer enters a time loop where a king repeatedly thrusts a sword at them, which ends when a friend assassinates the king with a pin.

scenes.text: A witch approaches a medieval town from underground, her presence so dangerous that everyone hides. The dreamer climbs a wooden wall to hide on the opposite side of where she might emerge, hearing her cackling nearby but never seeing her before waking.

The dreamer awakens blind, possibly cursed by the witch, then regains sight and steps into a courtyard with a king, his bodyguard, and a friend. The king repeatedly thrusts a sword at the dreamer, who catches it between their palms each time.

The dreamer realizes they're trapped in a time loop as the king's sword thrusts continue. The loop finally breaks when the dreamer's friend stabs the king with a pin attached to a circle. The bodyguard lunges at the friend, but the dreamer intervenes, urging a trial instead.

fragments: Waking up, then falling back asleep between dream sequences
The bodyguard's stoic reaction to the king's aggression
A pin with a circle attached as the murder weapon
Catching a sword blade between bare palms repeatedly
